Module cz.cvut.fel.pjv
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.model

Class Actions

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.model.Actions
public class Actions extends Object
Class with all possible actions in the game.

    • doHit

      public void doHit(CharacterModel o1, CharacterModel o2)
      Method for reducing the HP of a player or mob with parameters.
      Parameters:
      o1 - object that hit.
      o2 - objects that take a hit.

    • occurrenceOfDeath

      public boolean occurrenceOfDeath(CharacterModel o)
      Method to determine if any of the characters are dead with parameters.
      Parameters:
      o - object about which it is necessary to determine whether it is dead.
      Returns:
      true if objects HP less than 1.

    • occurrenceOfPlayersDeath

      public boolean occurrenceOfPlayersDeath(Knight knight)
      Method to determine if player is dead with parameters.
      Parameters:
      knight - object about which it is necessary to determine whether it is dead.
      Returns:
      true if knights HP or knights thirst level less than 1.

      Method to collect an apple with parameters.
      Parameters:
      knight - player who wants to pick up an apple.
      Returns:
      true if possible to pick up an apple(inventory is not full).

    • craftAPie

      public boolean craftAPie(Knight knight)
      Method for crafting a pie.
      Parameters:
      knight - who wants to craft a pie.
      Returns:
      true if possible to craft a pie(water quantity, apple quantity, pie quantity >= 2 and inventory is not full).

    • craftASoup

      public boolean craftASoup(Knight knight)
      Method for crafting a soup.
      Parameters:
      knight - who wants to craft a soup.
      Returns:
      true if possible to craft a soup(water quantity >= 3, meat quantity >= 1 and inventory is not full).

    • craftAWoodenAxe

      public boolean craftAWoodenAxe(Knight knight)
      Method for crafting a wooden axe.
      Parameters:
      knight - who wants to craft a wooden axe.
      Returns:
      true if possible to craft a wooden axe(wood quantity >= 2 and wooden axe is not already crafted).

    • craftAWoodenSword

      public boolean craftAWoodenSword(Knight knight)
      Method for crafting a wooden sword.
      Parameters:
      knight - who wants to craft a wooden sword.
      Returns:
      true if possible to craft a wooden sword(wood quantity >= 3 and wooden sword is not already crafted).

    • craftAWoodenShield

      public boolean craftAWoodenShield(Knight knight)
      Method for crafting a wooden shield.
      Parameters:
      knight - who wants to craft a wooden shield.
      Returns:
      true if possible to craft a wooden shield(wood quantity >= 4 and wooden shield is not already crafted).

      Method for crafting an iron axe.
      Parameters:
      knight - who wants to craft an iron axe.
      Returns:
      true if possible to craft an iron axe(wood quantity, iron quantity >= 1 and iron axe is not already crafted).
